meanings.definition: A large cash prize or sum of money won in a game or lottery.
meanings.sent1: She won the jackpot in the bingo game.
meanings.sent2: The lottery jackpot reached a million dollars.
meanings.sent3: Finding money in an old jacket pocket felt like hitting the jackpot.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was a jackpot of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The jackpot win made her jump with joy.

meanings.definition: A large or unexpected success or reward.
meanings.sent1: Their business venture turned out to be a jackpot.
meanings.sent2: Getting a promotion was a real jackpot for him.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was a jackpot of happiness.
meanings.sent4: His discovery was a jackpot in the world of science.
meanings.sent5: The jackpot of good luck seemed never-ending.
